overview: In homage to all the cheesy, unnecessary Christmas primetime cash-grabs of years gone by, join us (Frisky & Mannish) as we gather around the piano and pick apart your favourite Christmas songs and traditions.
tagline: In homage to all the cheesy, unnecessary Christmas primetime cash-grabs of years gone by, join us (Frisky & Mannish) as we gather around the piano and pick apart your favourite Christmas songs and traditions.
title: A Very Frisky & Mannish Christmas
